newsitem.title: USA: Metromail buys Music Marketing Network stake.
newsitem.headline: Metromail buys Music Marketing Network stake.

text.p: Metromail Corp said its 360 Capital Corp subsidiary acquired a significant minority stake in Music Marketing Network, which provides database marketing and other services for the music and entertainment industry.

Music Marketing Network, which had 1996 sales in excess of $4 million, uses a database of more than 3.5 million active music consumers to provide recording artists and companies direct access to their customers or detailed customer preference analysis and profiles.
Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Metromail provides database marketing, direct marketing and reference products and services in the United States and United Kingdom.
